description:
Speaker: Dr. Benjamin Werthmann

Track:PyData
The talk addresses how law and ethics can provide a framework for the “machines on the rise” that ensures fairness and societal acceptance while not interfering (too much) with the drive behind the advancement of a powerful technology.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/9VGGLP
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Law, ethics and machine learning - a curious ménage...
